attributes.action: make a public statement (something well within his power as Prime Minister) giving details of how much it costs to maintain a British presence in the middle of the Indian Ocean, in the form of the British Protectorate known as Diego Garcia and, more importantly, just why it is necessary, these days, to maintain the island as a british territory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With so many things needing to be paid for why is taxpayers money being wasted on keeping british military and diplomatic personnel on an island in the middle of the Indian Ocean?  The money will be much better spent on the NHS or keeping Post Offices open.

rejection.details: Petitions should be requests for change rather than requests for information. Please contact the Foreign Office / Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
